charges.charge_description: Knowingly and intentionally import, possess and conspire to possess with intent to distribute a quantity of more than five (5) kilograms of cocaine, a Schedule II controlled substance, into the United States from the Republic of Mexico; 21 USC 841 &; 846

charges.charge_offence_description: Knowingly and intentionally import, possess and co

charges.charge_description: Count 1: Conspiracy to Possess with Intent to Distribute more than 5 Kilograms of Cocaine; 21 USC 846, 841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(A)(1)
Count 2: Possession with Intent to Distribute more than 5 Kilograms, that is approximately, 12.62 Kilograms (27.76 pounds) of Cocaine; 21 USC 841(a)(1); 841(b)(1)(A) &; 18 USC 2(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 36 months BOP. 2 years SRT. Court waives Fine. Special Assessment $100.00 imposed.
